metadata.Title: CVE-2009-3608 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Integer overflow in the ObjectStream::ObjectStream function in XRef.cc in Xpdf 3.x before 3.02pl4 and Poppler before 0.12.1, as used in GPdf, kdegraphics KPDF, CUPS pdftops, and teTeX, might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted PDF document that triggers a heap-based buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: ipe package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
libextractor package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
poppler package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.12.2-2.1ubuntu1').
